Deep Learning with Functional Inputs

This package allows the user to build models of the form: $$f(z, g(x) | θ)$$ where f() is a neural network, z is a vector of scalar covariates, and g(x) is a vector of functional covariates. These are also known as functional neural networks (FNNs). The package is built on top of the Keras/Tensorflow architecture.

For more information on the methodology: https://arxiv.org/abs/2006.09590

Installation

You can install FNN from GitHub with the following commands:

library(devtools)
install_github("b-thi/FNN")
